meaningMnemonic: Remember how 襲撃 is an <kanji>assault</kanji> or <kanji>attack</kanji>? This is the verb form, so it's <vocabulary>to attack</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to assault</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
